japanese: 上杉君。
translation: Uesugi-kun.

japanese: 上杉君、起きて。
translation: Uesugi-kun, wake up.

japanese: ……えっ。
translation: ...Huh?

japanese: おはよーございまーす！
translation: Gooood morniiing!

japanese: フータロー君を見てたら私も眠くなってきたよ。
translation: Looking at you made me sleepy too, Futaro-kun.

japanese: 風邪ひいちゃう。
translation: You'll catch a cold.

japanese: そんなとこで寝てないで早く起きなさいよ。
translation:
Don't sleep in a place like that.
Wake up now.

japanese: あれ……結婚式は……。
translation: Huh...? The wedding...

japanese: へっ？
translation: Huh?

japanese: なに寝ぼけているんですか。
translation: Are you still half-asleep?

japanese: 気が早いわねぇ。
translation: You're quite hasty.

japanese: あ、いや、そんな夢をみたような……。
translation:
Ah, no, it's like I had a weird dream
or something...

japanese:
あなたがこんな所で寝るのもですが、
そんなことを言い出すのは珍しいですね。
translation:
It's unusual for you to say something like that,
and sleep in a place like this.

japanese:
全員の進路も無事に決まって、
安心して疲れが出たんじゃない？
translation:
Everyone has decided on their path,
so maybe you're just tired?

japanese: お、おう……。
translation: Y-yeah...

japanese: 結婚式って……。
translation: The wedding...?

japanese: 寝ぼけてる？
translation: Are you half-asleep?

japanese: 気が早いですねー。
translation: You're a little hasty.

japanese: あ、いや、そんな夢をみたような……。
translation:
Ah, no, it's like I had a weird dream
or something...

japanese:
あなたがこんな所で寝るのもですが、
そんなことを言い出すのは珍しいですね。
translation:
It's unusual for you to say something like that,
and sleep in a place like this.

japanese:
全員の進路も無事に決まって、
安心して疲れが出たんじゃない？
translation:
Everyone has decided on their path,
so maybe you're just tired?

japanese: お、おう……。
translation: Y-yeah...

japanese:
えっ！？
なに言ってるんですか！？
translation:
Huh?!
What are you saying?!

japanese: ……き、気が早いよ。
translation: ...Y-you're being hasty.

japanese: ホントだね。
translation: That's right.

japanese: あ、いや、そんな夢をみたような……。
translation:
Ah, no, it's like I had a weird dream
or something...

japanese:
あなたがこんな所で寝るのもですが、
そんなことを言い出すのは珍しいですね。
translation:
It's unusual for you to say something like that,
and sleep in a place like this.

japanese:
全員の進路も無事に決まって、
安心して疲れが出たんじゃない？
translation:
Everyone has decided on their path,
so maybe you're just tired?

japanese: お、おう……。
translation: Y-yeah...

japanese: えっ？　なに！？
translation: Huh? WHAT?!

japanese: えええっ！？
translation: WHAAAT?!

japanese: 気が早いねー。
translation: Don't be so hasty.

japanese: あ、いや、そんな夢をみたような……。
translation:
Ah, no, it's like I had a weird dream
or something...

japanese:
あなたがこんな所で寝るのもですが、
そんなことを言い出すのは珍しいですね。
translation:
It's unusual for you to say something like that,
and sleep in a place like this.

japanese:
全員の進路も無事に決まって、
安心して疲れが出たんじゃない？
translation:
Everyone has decided on their path,
so maybe you're just tired?

japanese: お、おう……。
translation: Y-yeah...

japanese: へ？　結婚式？
translation: Huh? A wedding?

japanese: なっ、なにを急に！？
translation: Wh-what are you saying, all of a sudden?!

japanese: これは寝ぼけてるな？
translation: This is sleepwalking, right?

japanese: あ、いや、そんな夢をみたような……。
translation:
Ah, no, it's like I had a weird dream
or something...

japanese:
あなたがこんな所で寝るのもですが、
そんなことを言い出すのは珍しいですね。
translation:
It's unusual for you to say something like that,
especially when you're sleeping in a place like this.

japanese:
全員の進路も無事に決まって、
安心して疲れが出たんじゃない？
translation:
Everyone has decided on their path,
so maybe you're just tired?

japanese: お、おう……。
translation: Y-yeah...

japanese:
って、待て。
お前はまだ卒業できるか決まってないだろ。
translation:
Wait a minute.
It hasn't even been decided if you can graduate yet,
right?

japanese: あはは、そうでしたー。
translation: Ahaha, that's right.

japanese: 卒業式後の試験に合格すればオッケーなんだよね？
translation:
If you pass the exam after the graduation ceremony,
then we're fine, right?

japanese:
うん。
休学扱いだったけど特別措置ってことでね。
学校側が色々配慮してくれたんだ。
translation:
Yeah. I was on a leave of absence, but it 
was a special situation and I could retake the test.
The school was considerate in many ways.

japanese:
ただし不合格なら容赦なく留年だ。
予断を許さない状況であることは自覚しろ。
translation:
But if you fail, you'll end up doing nothing for a year.
Be aware that the situation is unpredictable.

japanese: わかってますって。
translation: I get it, I get it.

japanese:
みんなと、なによりも君と一緒に卒業したいからね。
私の本気を見ててよ。
translation:
I want to graduate with everyone, but most of all,
I want to graduate with you.
Watch me give it my all.

japanese:
なるほど？
やっぱり愛のパワーは偉大ねぇ。
translation:
I see.
The power of love is truly great, isn't it.

japanese:
そ、そういうのは関係なく
常に頑張ってほしいんだがな……。
translation:
Th-that's not really relevant.
I just want you to always do your best...

japanese:
上杉さんがついてれば大丈夫！
私だって大学に合格させてもらえたんだからね。
translation:
With Uesugi-san by your side, you'll be okay!
I was able to get into university too, thanks to him.

japanese: 五月も希望通りの学校に合格できたし。
translation: Itsuki also got into the school she wanted.

japanese:
ええ。
こうして、教師という夢へ一歩近づけたのは
上杉君のおかげです。
translation:
Yes. I've come one step closer to my dream
of becoming a teacher, thanks to Uesugi-kun.

japanese:
せっかくチャンスをもらえたんだもん。
みんなと卒業するためにも本気出すよ。
translation:
I finally got this chance and
I'm going to do my best to graduate with everyone.

japanese:
上杉さんがついてれば大丈夫！
私だって大学に合格させてもらえたんだからね。
translation:
With Uesugi-san by your side, you'll be okay!
I was able to get into university too, thanks to him.

japanese: 五月も希望通りの学校に合格できたし。
translation: Itsuki also got into the school she wanted.

japanese:
ええ。
こうして、教師という夢へ一歩近づけたのは
上杉君のおかげです。
translation:
Yes. I've come one step closer to my dream
of becoming a teacher, thanks to Uesugi-kun.

japanese: まあ、本当に大変だったが……。
translation: Well, it was really tough, but...

japanese:
この結果は
お前ら自身の努力と積み重ねの結果なんだ。
胸を張っていいぜ。
translation:
It's the result of your continuous efforts and hard work. 
Be proud of yourselves.

japanese: はいっ！
translation: Alright!

japanese: ありがとうございます。
translation: Thank you very much.

japanese: 二乃と三玖は、春からは２人で料理の専門学校か。
translation:
Nino and Miku, you'll be attending
culinary school together in spring, right?

japanese:
そうね。
私まで大学に進学しないことになっちゃったのは
申し訳ないんだけど。
translation:
That's right. I'm sorry
I won't be going to university with you guys.

japanese:
いや、気にするな。
大学だけが進路じゃないさ。
なあ一花？
translation:
Don't worry about it.
University isn't the only path to take.
Right, Ichika?

japanese:
うん。
私も、高校を無事に卒業したら女優の道へと
邁進する予定ですので。
translation:
That's right.
After graduating from high school,
I plan to pursue my dream of becoming an actress.

japanese: とっくにしてる気がするけど？
translation: Feels like you're already doing it, though.

japanese: 確かに。
translation: That's true.

japanese:
それにしても、大学だけが進路じゃないなんて、
出会った頃の君を思うと信じられない台詞だなぁ。
translation:
However, it's hard to believe you're saying
that university isn't the only path,
given the person I met back then.

japanese: いや、それはまあ……。
translation: Ah, right...

japanese:
上杉さんにとっては、東京の大学に進むのが
一番の進路だったってことですね！
translation:
For you, Uesugi-san, going to university in Tokyo
was the best path, wasn't it!

japanese:
東京ですか。
こうして話していると、改めて、
もうすぐ新しい生活が始まるのだと感じますね。
translation:
Tokyo, huh. As we talk about it like this,
I feel like we're about to start a new life soon.

japanese:
どうなっていくのかしら。
未だに想像できないわ。
translation:
I wonder how things will turn out.
I can't imagine how it'll be.

japanese: 私たちはここでは一緒だけど、上杉さんは……。
translation: While we're all here together, Uesugi-san...

japanese:
（そうだ。
　俺はもう、いままでのように
　こいつらと同じ時を過ごすことはできなくなる）
translation:
(That's right. I won't be able to spend time
 with these guys like I used to.)

japanese:
だから嬉しかったんだ。
フータローが卒業旅行を提案してくれて。
translation:
That's why I was so happy.
When you suggested a graduation trip, Futaro.

japanese:
高校最後の思い出作り、なんてあなたが言うなんて。
これもまた想像できなかったことですね。
translation:
I can't imagine you saying,
'Let's make our last high school memories memorable.'

japanese: ま、まあな。
translation: Y-yeah, I guess.

japanese:
（高校最後の思い出作り。
　それももちろん本心だが、なによりも
　俺はこの旅行であいつに――）
translation:
(Making our last high school memories.
 That's certainly true, but more than anything,
 I'm going on this trip to show her%p-2;――%p;)

japanese: （男を見せるんだ！！）
translation: (The kind of man I really am!!)

japanese:
（そうか。
　さっき結婚式の夢なんて見ちまったのも、
　この決意ゆえかもしれないな）
translation:
(I see. Maybe the reason I had that dream
 about a wedding earlier
 was because of my determination.)

japanese: （なにしろ、俺はこの旅行であいつと……！）
translation: (After all, I'm going on this trip with her...!)

japanese:
上杉君？
急に考え込んでどうしました？
translation:
Uesugi-kun?
Is something bothering you all of a sudden?

japanese:
はっ！？
い、い、いや、なんでもない！
translation:
Huh?!
N-n-no, it's nothing!

japanese:
そんなことよりもだ！　行き先を決めようぜ！
今日はそのために集まったんだろ？
translation:
Anyway, let's decide where to go!
Isn't that why we all gathered here today?

japanese:
とか言って、さっきまで寝てたのは
どこの誰かしらねー。
translation:
You say that,
but I wonder who was asleep until just now.

japanese:
うーん、これは迷うなー。
いっそ海外って手もあるよね。
translation:
Well, this is a tough decision.
Maybe we should consider going overseas.

japanese: ねぇよ！
translation: No way!

japanese: え？　なんで？
translation: Huh? Why?

japanese:
旅費だ旅費。
俺をお前らと一緒にすんじゃねぇ、行き先は近場だ！
translation:
Travel expenses, of course.
Don't compare me to you guys,
we're going somewhere nearby!

japanese: 旅費なら出すよ。
translation: We'll cover the travel expenses.

japanese:
は？　いや待て待て。
いくらなんでもそれは……。
translation:
What? Wait, wait a minute.
That's just too much...

japanese:
安心して、奢りなつもりはないから。
出世払いってことで。
translation:
Don't worry,
we're not planning on treating you.
Consider it an investment in our future success.

japanese:
はあ……。
まあ、そういうことなら。
translation:
*sigh*
Well, if that's the case.

japanese:
となれば、どこがいいですかね？
せっかくですし遠くに行きましょう！
translation:
Then where should we go?
Since this is going to be our last high school trip,
let's go as far away as possible!

japanese: 近場でいいだろ。
translation: Nearby should be fine.

japanese:
ええー？
思い出作りなんだからパーっと行こうよ。
translation:
Huh?
Come on, we're making memories, so let's just
up and head somewhere.

japanese:
パーっと……ですか？
旅行ってそういうものでしょうか。
translation:
Up and head...somewhere?
Is that what traveling is all about?

japanese:
羽目を外すって意味ではそうじゃない？
受験も終わって、全てから解き放たれたんだから
思いっきり遊ばないと！
translation:
Well, it doesn't necessarily mean going all out, but
now that exams are over and we're free from everything,
we should have the time of our lives!

japanese:
ね、フータロー君！
自分へのご褒美ってのも悪くないと思うよ？
translation:
Hey, Futaro-kun!
Don't you think treating yourself is a good idea too?

japanese: その、自分へのご褒美って発想はサッパリわからん。
translation:
I don't really get the concept
of treating yourself though.

japanese: あらら？
translation: Oh, my?

japanese:
けどまあ、お前らにとっては
そのほうが楽しいってのなら、付き合うか。
translation:
Oh well, if it's more fun for you guys,
then I'll go along with it.

japanese:
やったね！
さすが話がわかるなー。
translation: Yay! You understand us so well, Futaro-kun.

japanese: では、５人で指差しするのはどうですか？
translation: So, how about us five pointing to a place together?

japanese: 俺の意見は？
translation: Where's my say?

japanese: 結果は知れてるけどねー。
translation: Well, we already know the result.

japanese: おう、せっかくだしな。
translation: Yeah, since we're going anyway.

japanese:
ですよね！
じゃあ、ここはやっぱり海外、行っちゃいます？
translation:
Right!
Alright, so are we really gonna go overseas here?

japanese:
ほーう？
よほど語学力に自信がついたと見えるな。
translation:
Oh?
Looks like you've gained some confidence
in your language skills.

japanese: え。
translation: What?

japanese:
ならば見せてもらおうじゃないか！
通訳なしで旅ができるかどうか！
translation:
In that case, I'll have you show me them!
How about a vacation with no interpreter?!

japanese: それは無理。
translation: That's impossible. Let's just stay in Japan.

japanese: では、５人で指差しするのはどうですか？
translation: So, how about us five pointing to a place together?

japanese: 俺の意見は？
translation: Where's my say?

japanese: 結果は知れてるけどねー。
translation: Well, we already know the result.

japanese: 例えばどこだ？
translation: For example, where do you suggest?

japanese:
そうねー。
例えば……。
translation:
Let's see...
For example...

japanese: 風太郎がいればどこだっていいわ。
translation: Anywhere is fine if you're with us, Futaro.

japanese: ……いや、その、答えになってないぞ。
translation: ...Uh, well, that's not really an answer.

japanese: 二乃。
translation: Nino.

japanese:
ぴぴー。
急に２人の世界を作らないでくださーい。
translation:
Hey now.
Don't just run off with her alone.

japanese: では、５人で指差しするのはどうですか？
translation: So, how about us five pointing to a place together?

japanese: 俺の意見は？
translation: Where's my say?

japanese: 結果は知れてるけどねー。
translation: Well, we already know the result.

japanese: 私はフー君がいればどこだっていいわ。
translation: Anywhere is fine if you're with us, Fu-kun.

japanese:
いや答えになってねぇよ。
だったら近場にするぞ。
translation:
Well, that's not really an answer.
In that case, let's go somewhere nearby.

japanese:
……はいはい。
さすがの反応ね。
translation:
...Yeah, yeah.
Your response is as expected.

japanese: では、５人で指差しするのはどうですか？
translation: So, how about us five pointing to a place together?

japanese: 俺の意見は？
translation: Where's my say?

japanese: 結果は知れてるけどねー。
translation: Well, we already know the result.

japanese: 俺もそう思う。
translation: I think so too.

japanese: じゃあ、せーのでいくよ！
translation: Alright, let's do this on three!

japanese: せーのっ！　ここっ！
translation: One, two, THREE! Here!

japanese: ……ほらな？
translation: ...Look, see?

japanese:
あはは。
予想通り、見事に全員バラバラだ。
translation:
Ahaha.
As expected, we all pointed to different places.

japanese:
はあ……。
五つ子ってめんどくせー……。
translation:
*sigh*
Quintuplets are so troublesome...

japanese: やはり北海道の食べ物は魅力的ですね。
translation: Still, the food in Hokkaido is so tempting, isn't it?

japanese:
でもまだ寒くない？
雪も多いかも。
translation:
But isn't it still cold there?
And there might be a lot of snow.

japanese: やっぱり、そこよねぇ。
translation: Yeah, that's true, isn't it.

japanese:
雪かぁ。
いっそ春スキーに行くのもいいかも。
translation:
Snow, eh.
Maybe it'd be nice to go spring skiing.

japanese:
となると長野？
ついでに温泉も楽しめそう。
translation:
In that case, how about Nagano?
We can also enjoy hot springs on the side.

japanese: 新潟もありですね。
translation: Niigata is also a possibility.

japanese:
でもスキーじゃ
あんまり卒業旅行って感じしなくない？
translation:
But skiing doesn't really feel
like a graduation trip, does it?

japanese: あー、それはある。
translation: Yeah, that's true.

japanese: じゃあ――
translation: In that case%p-2;――

japanese: いい加減にしろっ！
translation: Enough already!

japanese:
うひゃっ！
どうしました上杉さん！？
translation:
WAAAH!
What's the matter, Uesugi-san?

japanese:
どうしましたじゃねぇ！！
いつまで揉めてる気だ、もう１時間は経ったぞ！
translation:
Don't give me that 'what's the matter' crap!
How long are we going to argue?
It's been an hour already!

japanese:
だって、せっかくなんだから
納得行くところにしたいんだもの。
translation:
But, you know, since it's a rare opportunity,
we want to choose a place that we can all agree on.

japanese:
この調子じゃ絶対に決まらないだろ！
もういい、俺が決める！
translation:
At this rate, we'll never decide!
Alright, just let me decide!

japanese:
そうですね。
実を言うと決まる気がしないので……。
translation:
Well, to be honest,
I don't really have a place in mind either...

japanese: ここはフータローに決めてもらうのがよさそう。
translation: It seems best to have Futaro decide, here.

japanese:
任せろ。
お前らそれぞれの希望は散々聞かされたからな、
全てを満たす場所を示してやる！
translation:
Leave it to me.
I've heard all of your wishes,
so I'll show us a place that satisfies all of them!

japanese: それは……。
translation: And, that is...

japanese: それは？
translation: That is?

japanese: 沖縄だっ！
translation: Okinawa!

japanese: 沖縄？
translation: Okinawa?

japanese:
この時期の沖縄は、寒くなく暑すぎずのいい季候で
のんびりできるはずだ。
translation:
Okinawa at this time of the year
should have nice weather that's not too hot or too cold
and we should be able to relax.

japanese: ほうほう。
translation: I see.

japanese:
海の素晴らしさは言うまでもなく、
マリンスポーツをはじめとする
アクティビティも盛んだ！
translation:
Of course, the beauty of the sea goes without saying,
and there are plenty of activities
such as marine sports!

japanese: ですね！
translation: That's right!

japanese: 海だけではなく、独自の自然の美しさも堪能できる！
translation:
Not only the sea,
but we can also enjoy the unique beauty of nature!

japanese: うんうん。
translation: Yes, that's true.

japanese: 名高いパワースポットも多くある！
translation: There are also many famous power spots!

japanese: 確かにそうね。
translation: That's certainly true.

japanese:
海産物に代表される豊富な食材、
それらを生かした料理を楽しめる！
translation:
With a wealth of ingredients represented by seafood,
we can enjoy cuisine that makes the most of them!

japanese: なるほど……！
translation: Oh...I see!

japanese:
どうだ？
これ以上の場所があるか？
translation:
How about it?
Is there a better place than this?

japanese: いえ、お見事です。
translation: No, it's amazing!

japanese: これは決まりでしょ。
translation: This is definitely it.

japanese: さすがは上杉さん！
translation: As expected of Uesugi-san!

japanese: 最初から決めてもらえばよかったかな～。
translation: We should have had you decide from the beginning.

japanese: それだとすぐ近くにされてたと思う。
translation:
If we did,
we would have ended up with a place really close.

japanese: ……まあ、否定しないが。
translation: ...Well, I won't deny that.
